name: New brothread 40 Brother Colors 500m Each Embroidery Machine Thread with Clear Plastic Storage Box for Embroidery Sewing Machine
short_description: ★ 40 Spools Brother Colors + Clear Plastic Storage Box: High Value 40 Brother colors 500m polyester embroidery machine thread with 2 layers premium clear plastic storage box. Free Thread Nets, 1x Mark Pen, 1x Yarn Snips and 1x Color Chart are also included in the package. ★ Stackable & Lockable Two Layers Clear Plastic Storage Box: All 40 spools polyester embroidery threads are orderly organized in the storage box with 2 layers. Each layer can be stacked and locked with each other firmly. The super transparency of the storage box can help you looking for needed colors from outside easily. There are 20 plastic pins in each layer to hold each spool upwards, it also can prevent the spool from falling down. ★ Multi type of Spools to Store and Portable Box: The clear plastic storage box not only can store New brothread 500m & 1000m embroidery machine threads, but also can store lots of mini spools sewing and embroidery threads from different brands. A special small storage space on top of the lid can store other small sewing items such as needles, scissors, mark pens, pins, bobbins etc. So you can carry your sewing and embroidery threads to do customized projects or have sewing classes anywhere. ★ Polyester Embroidery Machine Thread: Super Color Fastness, High Strength and Exceptional Lustre, all these Excellent Characters are based on the material of our embroidery machine thread: 100% Polyester!!! Lower risks of breaking or fraying, Elasticity and Tenacity of polyester also reduces risks of looping and puckering of Polyester Embroidery Machine Thread. ★★ New brothread Polyester Embroidery Machine Thread always think what you think, do what you do, love what you love. ▶▶【Reach to "New brothread" for original WARRANTY!!!】

name: ArtBin Floss Finder Box: Clear Sewing Organizer with 6 Compartments, 12 Dividers, Durable - Perfect for Embroidery Floss and Small Sewing Supplies Storage
short_description: Organized Storage Solution: ArtBin box for embroidery floss and sewing supplies. Floss Finder with 6 fixed compartments, customizable with 12 removable dividers. Clear and Viewable Design: Translucent Floss Finder for easy content viewing. Quick and convenient embroidery floss selection. No more searching through drawers. Durable Construction: Floss Finder Box with Dividers made of tough Polypropylene plastic. Resists wear and tear. Shatterproof with no-spill latches and sturdy hinges. Organization: Floss bobbins are not included to allow for personalized selection based on individual preferences. Product Specifications: Floss Finder Box dimensions - 10.75 x 7.375 x 1.75 inches; translucent color for easy identification. Proudly crafted in the United States of America.
product_description: Upgrade your sewing experience with the ArtBin Floss Finder Box, the ultimate storage solution for embroidery enthusiasts and sewing aficionados alike. Say goodbye to cluttered drawers and tangled threads—this meticulously designed box offers a perfect home for all your embroidery floss and small sewing supplies. With 6 fixed compartments and 12 removable dividers included, you can effortlessly customize the storage space to suit your needs, ensuring easy access to your favorite colors and materials. The clear, translucent design of the Floss Finder allows for quick and convenient viewing of the contents, making thread selection a breeze and eliminating the hassle of searching through drawers for the right shade. Crafted from durable, shatterproof Polypropylene plastic, this box is built to withstand the demands of everyday use, protecting your supplies from wear and tear. The no-spill latches and sturdy hinges ensure that your materials remain secure during transport, providing peace of mind wherever your creative journey takes you. Proudly made in the USA, the ArtBin Floss Finder Box is a testament to quality craftsmanship and attention to detail. Measuring 10.75 x 7.375 x 1.75 inches, this translucent box offers ample space for organizing your embroidery essentials while maintaining a compact footprint. Whether you're a seasoned sewer or just starting out, this versatile storage solution is sure to enhance your crafting experience and streamline your workflow. Say hello to effortless organization and rediscover the joy of sewing with the ArtBin Floss Finder Box.
